articles.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
articles.title: Ford doubles down on EVs in Europe with $2 billion push - The Verge
articles.description: Ford will introduce seven new electric vehicles in Europe by 2024 as part of a $2 billion push. The company will shift to EV-only sales by 2035.
articles.content:
The company aims to release seven electric models by 2024

articles.title: Broos Trims Bafana Squad For Europe - Soccer Laduma
articles.description: Bafana Bafana coach has confirmed the players that have been left out for the trip to Europe.
articles.content:
Hugo Broos on Monday reduced his Bafana Bafana squad for the trip to Europe from 29 to 23 as they prepare to take on Guinea and world champions France.

articles.title: Russian troops abduct second Ukraine mayor - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: A Ukraine mayor was abducted by invading Russian forces on Sunday, the second such kidnapping in days, bringing strong condemnation from the European Union.
articles.content:
